price: Such was Jesus, son of Mary – a word of truth about which they are in doubt.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ عِيسَى ٱبۡنُ مَرۡيَمَۖ قَوۡلَ ٱلۡحَقِّ ٱلَّذِي فِيهِ يَمۡتَرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: dhālika ʿīsā ub'nu maryama qawla al-ḥaqi alladhī fīhi yamtarūna
